text: Greyhound is an upcoming American war movie directed by Aaron Schneider and starring Tom Hanks, who also wrote the screenplay. The movie is based on the 1955 novel The Good Shepherd by C. S. Forester, and also stars Stephen Graham, Rob Morgan, and Elisabeth Shue. Greyhound was originally supposed to be theatrically released in the United States on June 12, 2020, by Sony Pictures, but was delayed due to the COVID-19 pandemic. It will now be released on July 10, 2020 only on Apple TV+. It received generally positive reviews from critics. ==References== Category:2020 movies Category:2020s war movies Category:American war movies Category:Canadian movies Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies set in the 1940s Category:World War II movies
title: Greyhound (movie)
